item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

skiller noob1:

Lol, nither do you.

I know that I don’t either have 15 rep.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2008, 05:16:00 am[/size][hr]Now I made a revenant vampire, it has 1 different effect that no else rev has. I’ll explain it later, but here are the pics:

revvampireshowoff.jpg661×509

I’ll explain the image by the number: 1 Showing from in front, 2 Melee attack, 3 Poison attack, 4 Teleblock attack - gfx, ancient teleport backwards, 5 Food stealing attack - explained later, 6 Mage attack, 7 Freeze/Bind attack, 8 block - it turns almost invisible a second and 9 dead emote - fades away.

Food stealing explained - Steals an easter egg or manta ray from you, depending on wich food you have.
Say if you like the vampire or something else more than others.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2008, 05:59:17 am[/size][hr]If you want to keep this topic alive then please BUMP it. :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2008, 09:16:57 am[/size][hr]100 views

item.title: I made a rev like npc in my server, rate or comment about it. !NOT A TUT!
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

Yes I made a revenant like npc in my server the id is 910 and its kolodion’s (mage arena boss) third form, giant ghost. It Melees, mages, teleblocks, poisons, freezes and stuns. I probaly can’t make a tut of this, just wanted to post to see if ppl like it and this is a deplovement/help selection right? Ppl can’t know what is it like if there aren’t no pics and im posting u some:
Yup, he’s big and walks auround the wilderness.

Mage attack - its very accurate and can KO u easily if you are in 40 hp or under.

Melee kick attack - My favourite It’s unaccurate, but can hit more than mage attack. Also the player stumbles back

Poison attack - His most annoying attack, it poisons you and sometimes he masses it, like does it more than 2 times in a row wich is really annoying cuz you need to drink antipoison or else the poison may kill you.

Image of the poisons hit, it hits 4-18, drink an antipoison and It goes away.

Teleblock - You should know this - makes that you can’t teleport away.

Stun - kinda annoying cuz it freezes you a while and makes u attack slower a while.

Freeze - Freezes you 20 seconds, when the rev casts it, he does a spin attack.

Magic spell failure - You know what this means, 0 hit.

When it dies it does the dead emote and fades away…

Block - Looks like verac’s block from this side of the camera, but it really is block with 1 handed weapon.

I made the revenant with help of this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,289949.0.html

You can rate it if you want in /10 like 5/10
10/10 = Awesome!
0/10 = Poor/bad.

And don’t forget to comment about it if you want.

EDIT: I also made up and icefiend look my second latest post to see it.
EDIT2: I made a revenant Vampire have a look at it at my latest post.

The emotes and gfxs I used:

EMOTES 1979 - Mageattack emote, it's the Barrage emote 406 - Stun emote, it's the 2h crush emote 423 - Kick attack 791 - Poison attack emote, it's the runecrafting emote 1818 - Teleblock attack emote, it's the teleother emote 2876 - Freeze attack emote, it's the spin attack emote 2103 - IM NOT SURE I think its the magic spell failure emote, it's the magic emote 2820 - Dead emote and fades away... 404 - Block with 1handed weapon, no shield
Now the gfxs:

[code]Mage attack:
147 - Crumble undead hit
134 - Wind blast explsion

Poison attack:
402 - green puff of smoke or poison smoke

Teleblock attack:
342 - Teleother teleport grapich
345 - Teleblock contact

Stun attack:
80 - yellow stun birdies

Freeze attack:
360 - ice rush projectile
361 - ice rush contact

TELL ME IF I FORGOT SOMETHING[/code]

I you soo much want in your server npc’s like this then here are the codes, of course this isn’t a tut so you have to figure out yourself where to add them: spawn = 910 3094 3764 0 3152 3875 2952 3712 2 giant ghost rev spawn = 910 2980 3753 0 3152 3875 2952 3712 2 giant ghost rev

 npcs[i].npcType == 910 ||[/code] [code] npcs[i].npcType == 910 ||

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 910) { npcs[i].animNumber = 2820; // deademote (rev giant ghost)

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 1) { p.stillgfx(80, p.absY, p.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 406; castOnPlayer.snare(); p.sendMessage("The revenant giant ghost stuns you!"); } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 2) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(28); p.stillgfx(360, p.absY, p.absX); p.stillgfx(361, p.absY, p.absX); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2876; castOnPlayer.entangle(); p.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 3) { hitDiff = 25 + misc.random(0); p.stillgfx(342, p.absY, p.absX); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 1818; castOnPlayer.Teleblock(); p.sendMessage("You have been teleblocked!!"); } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 4) { hitDiff = 25 + misc.random(8); p.stillgfx(402, p.absY, p.absX); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 791; castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); p.sendMessage("You have been poisoned!"); } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 5) { hitDiff = 39 + misc.random(5); p.stillgfx(147, p.absY, p.absX); p.stillgfx(134, p.absY, p.absX); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 1979; } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 6) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(45); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 423; p.setAnimation(1114); } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 7) { hitDiff = 39 + misc.random(5); gfxAll(147, EnemyY, EnemyX); gfxAll(134, EnemyY, EnemyX); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 1979; } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 8) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(45); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 423; p.setAnimation(1114); }

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 1) { gfxAll(80, EnemyY, EnemyX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 406; castOnPlayer.snare(); p.sendMessage("The revenant giant ghost stuns you!"); } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 2) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(28); gfxAll(360, EnemyY, EnemyX); gfxAll(361, EnemyY, EnemyX); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2876; castOnPlayer.entangle(); p.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 3) { hitDiff = 25 + misc.random(0); gfxAll(342, EnemyY, EnemyX); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 1818; castOnPlayer.Teleblock(); p.sendMessage("You have been teleblocked!!"); } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 4) { hitDiff = 35 + misc.random(8); gfxAll(402, EnemyY, EnemyX); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 791; castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); p.sendMessage("You have been poisoned!"); } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 5) { hitDiff = 39 + misc.random(5); gfxAll(147, EnemyY, EnemyX); gfxAll(134, EnemyY, EnemyX); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 1979; } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 6) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(45); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 423; p.setAnimation(1114); } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 7) { hitDiff = 39 + misc.random(5); gfxAll(147, EnemyY, EnemyX); gfxAll(134, EnemyY, EnemyX); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 1979; } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 910 && misc.random(8) == 8) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(45); npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 423; p.setAnimation(1114); }

case 910: // giant ghost rev block animation return 404;

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2008, 06:43:27 am[/size][hr]Also only thing it needs is agressiviness. I want it to attack ppl if they are near it, if you know how to make npc’s agressive please post or post a link for a tut. I don’t want things such as: Search jad’s id and u should find the agressive list, in every server jad is agressive!

Well, I haven’t seen a server where monsters are agressive, not even jad!

Agressive is not that they att back when they are bein attacked.

Read full topic
